医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
产前抗生素会削弱母乳免疫吗？一项新研究旨在找出一项新研究将研究产前抗生素是否会损害母乳的免疫功能并破坏新生儿肠道菌群，从而可能影响婴儿健康。研究人员的目的是评估妊娠晚期抗生素暴露的长期影响如何改变母乳IgA和新生儿免疫发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/do-prenatal-antbiotics-weaken-breast-milk-imlk-immunity-a-new-new-study-new-study-aims-aims-aims-to-find.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/do-prenatal-antabiotics-weaken-breast-milk-imlk-immunity-a-new-new-study-new-study-aims-aims-aims-to-find-find-comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d881d13-415c-43b8-43b8-af4c-f4c-f56826EF0934 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 22:44:00 -0500 Do prenatal antibiotics weaken breast milk immunity? A new study aims to find out
食肉动物饮食可以触发肾结石吗？案例研究增加了红旗《美国临床营养杂志》上的一项案例研究研究了一名患者的切换到食肉动物饮食如何通过提高钙，尿酸和草酸盐水平来增加肾结石的风险，同时降低柠檬酸保护含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/can-the-carnivore-diet-diet-trigger-kidney-stones-case-case-case-study-study-rasis-rasis-rasis-red-flags.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/can-the-carnivore-diet-diet-trigger-kidney-stones-case-case-case-study-s-----------------red-flags.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3316630f-2358-4de8-bb33-fb33-fb09da334399 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 22:06:00 -0500 Can the carnivore diet trigger kidney stones? Case study raises red flags
新研究发现，维生素E显着改善了MASH患者的肝脏健康一项为期96周的临床试验发现，300 mg维生素E可显着改善肝脏学和MASH患者的炎症减少，但没有重大安全问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/vitamin-e-siminficatifatifation--improves-liver-health-health-health-health-nealth-mash-patients-new-study-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/vitamin-e-simnicatifucation--improves-liver-health-health-health-health-in-mash-patients-new-study-study-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d555b9038-82ab-4987-9AC1-979DDF80E126 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 21:43:00 -0500 Vitamin E significantly improves liver health in MASH patients, new study finds
科学家通过粪便DNA跟踪饮食，揭示了一种监测营养的新方法科学家开发了Medi，这是一种从人粪中的食物DNA估算饮食摄入量的方法，为自我报告的食物跟踪提供了更准确的替代方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/scientist-track-drack-diet-though-stool-new-dna-revealing-a-new-new-way-way-way-way-new-way-new-way-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/scientist-track-diet-track-diet-though-stool-new-dna-revealing-a-new-new-way-way-way-way-way-to-monitor-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f0426a-673d-4A94-8A6C-C324B5AF1527 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 20:47:00 -0500 Scientists track diet through stool DNA, revealing a new way to monitor nutrition
吃这个，不是：最好（且最糟糕的）食物寿命对分析超过100万参与者的41项研究的全面综述发现，食用坚果，全谷物，水果，蔬菜和鱼类与降低全因死亡率有关，而加工和未经处理的红肉和糖含糖饮料的饮料会增加死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/eat-this-this-not-that-the-best---------------------------foreds-foreds-for longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/eat-this-not-that-the-best----------- and-worst-）foods-fords-for longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45BC985E-C5BE-4E28-A6CE-24B92C252862 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 16:27:00 -0500 Eat this, not that: The best (and worst) foods for longevity
释放双重记忆B细胞在癌症治疗中的潜力匹兹堡大学医学院和UPMC Hillman癌症中心科学家发现了一个新型的抗癌免疫细胞子集，该细胞位于其正常社区以外（被称为第三级淋巴样结构），在与肿瘤密切接触时，它们变得令人沮丧的功能障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/unlocking-the-potential-of-double-double-memory-memory-b-cells-in-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/unlocking-the-potential-of-double-double-memory-memory-b-cells-in-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BB058F56-B1A2-4565-9678-FADF50E564C8 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 14:40:46 -0500 Unlocking the potential of double negative memory B cells in cancer treatment

小鼠研究提供了有关大脑如何平衡风险和回报的洞察力每天，我们的大脑都会做出数千个大小的决定。这些决定中的任何一个 - 从最不合时宜的情况下，例如选择餐厅到更重要的事情，例如从事不同的职业或搬到新城市 - 可能会带来更好或更糟的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/mice-study-ctudy-ctudy-ingign-insight-into-how-the-the-brain-brain-barance-risk-alk-and-reward.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/mice-study-ctudy-ctudy-chight-insight-insto-how-the-the-brain-brain-barance-risk-alk-and-reward.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13131D12-3127-44F9-9191-8CD1E5E7C3BB Wed, 19 Feb 2025 14:27:05 -0500 Mice study offers insight into how the brain balances risk and reward
